org.jboss.windup.config.loader

Class DefaultRuleProviderLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jboss.windup.config.loader.DefaultRuleProviderLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RuleProviderLoader

    public class DefaultRuleProviderLoader
extends Object
implements RuleProviderLoader
    Default implementation of RuleProviderLoader that uses Furnace to load RuleProvider instances and establish relationships with their corresponding RulesetMetadata if available.
    Author:
    Lincoln Baxter, III

    • Constructor Detail

        public DefaultRuleProviderLoader()

    • Method Detail

      • isFileBased

        public boolean isFileBased()
        Description copied from interface: RuleProviderLoader
        Indicates that these are not classloader based Java rules. Instead these are rules loaded from the filesystem. This can be used to display only XML rules to the user, in cases where they are not interested in other rules.
        Specified by:
        isFileBased in interface RuleProviderLoader

      • getProviders

        public List<RuleProvider> getProviders(RuleLoaderContext ruleLoaderContext)
        Description copied from interface: RuleProviderLoader
        Return all AbstractRuleProvider instances that are relevant for this loader.
        Specified by:
        getProviders in interface RuleProviderLoader
